results.title: SearchLook Security Trace
results.challenge: The problem at hand was to implement a comprehensive security and traceability system within an existing product. From a security perspective, the challenge involved creating a strong Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) system for both the backend and front end and a multi-channel OTP delivery for enhanced security. To achieve traceability, user activities had to be logged for each request, and a frontend feature for downloading the activities. Striking a balance between security, usability, and data protection was essential to ensure a smooth and secure user experience throughout the project
results.solution: The solution addressed both security and traceability aspects. For security, we created endpoints for Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) using the Twilio verification service for secure OTP handling. The login process was updated to accommodate 2FA and non-2FA scenarios, and APIs for setting up 2FA with multi-channel OTP delivery (SMS, email) were implemented. To ensure traceability, we added endpoints for user deactivation and retrieving user activities. We also included a user-friendly report generation feature for activity records download. The workflow successfully tackled 2FA, user activation/deactivation, and user activity tracking, and implemented a unique identifier for enhanced security in the Searchlook security project.
